siteMetadata.title: Victory in Jesus
siteMetadata.subtitle: We can have victory because Our Lord and Savior conquered Sin and Death!

frontmatter.title: Introducing the Sword of the Spirit
frontmatter.description: What is the the Sword of the Spirit. It's the Word of God. It's your weapon against the enemy. It's sharper than any double-edged sword!

frontmatter.title: True meaning of Christmas
frontmatter.description: What is Christmas about? Why do we celebrate it? These are all some great questions. Let's take a look at the true meaning of Christmas

frontmatter.title: Assurance you are saved
frontmatter.description: It is the work of the enemey to confuse us and make us think we are not saved. Remember that you can never lose your salvation. 1 John is a great essential doctrine passage that shows us we can be assured of our salvation.

frontmatter.title: Blessings from the Cross
frontmatter.description: The work of the Cross was so significant and we reap so many benefits thanks to Jesus Christ. I take a look at some of those blessings in my lastest devotional.

frontmatter.title: Joy in a divided world
frontmatter.description: Joy is not dependent on outward things.  Joy comes from inward things when you have rest in your soul. Joy comes from having one mind. A mind that is like Jesus Christ.  in control. This passage give us the blueprint on how to remain joyous

frontmatter.title: Joy in any Circumstance
frontmatter.description: Sometimes it may be hard to remain joyous under intense situations like what we are going through with the Corona Virus. However, it's important to remember that God is in control. This passage give us the blueprint on how to remain joyous
